Class BoxConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.box.boxjavalibv2.BoxConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoxConfig
public class BoxConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoxConfig

Class for retrieving configuration parameters.

developers@box.net

Parameters:
timeout - Desired connection timeout.

appendCustomQueryParameterToAllRequests

public void appendCustomQueryParameterToAllRequests(java.lang.String key,
                                                    java.lang.String value)
Add a custom query parameter that will be added to all Box API requests. In general you should not need to use this.

Parameters:
key - Key.
value - Value.

clearCustomQueryParameters

public void clearCustomQueryParameters()
Clear out all custom query parameters that may have been set.

getCustomQueryParameters

public java.util.List<org.apache.http.message.BasicNameValuePair> getCustomQueryParameters()
Get a list of all custom query parameters that have been set. This may return null or an empty List if none have been set. The list returned is not modifiable. Attempts to modify the returned list, whether direct or via its iterator, result in an UnsupportedOperationException.

Returns:
Unmodifiable list of custom query parameters.
